        tid - - template ID
        name - - name of the promotion
        discount - - discount amount
        startTime - - start time of the promotion
        endTime - - end time of the promotion
        startDate - - start date of the promotion
        endDate - - end date of the promotion
        typeOfCustomer - - Type of Customer {Private,Company}
        typeOfFuel - - Type of Fuel (1-4)
        pid - - Promotion ID
